message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to acquire a valuable product. I believe it's a great fit for your needs, and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to start with an initial offer of $2000000. What are your thoughts?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $800000. Is that something we can work with?

Thanks for your counteroffer, Bob. I understand you're looking to get a good deal, but I have to consider the value of the product as well. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm going to counter with $1200000. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit far off. I'm willing to pay $900000 for the product. Is that something we can agree on?

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go as low as $900000. I'm willing to compromise a bit more, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for the product. I'll counter with $1050000. This is my final offer in this range, but I'm open to negotiations if you're willing to meet me in the middle.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit far off. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Is that something we can agree on?

I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more significant concession, but I need to make sure I'm not leaving money on the table. I'll counter with $1075000. This is my last offer before I start to get concerned that we're not going to come to an agreement.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get as close as possible to my budget. I'm willing to pay $925000 for the product. Is that something we can agree on?

I'm starting to get a bit concerned that we're not going to come to an agreement, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to make sure I'm not losing too much. I'll counter with $1050000, but this is my absolute final offer. If you're not willing to meet me here, I'm going to have to explore other options.

I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still trying to get as close as possible to my budget. I'm willing to pay $850000 for the product. This is my final offer, and I hope we can come to an agreement.
